titleStmt.title: A treatise of the schism of England. Wherein particularly Mr. Hales and Mr. Hobbs are modestly accosted. / By Philip Scot. Permissu superiorum.
titleStmt.author: Scot, Philip.

notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication from Wing.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the second and the last leaf are blank.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Dec: 5th 1650."; Amsterdam has been crossed out and replaced with "London".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
